name: Jack (itch) (ZachElkins)
description:
Play as Jack the lumber jack and cut down as many trees as you can. Be careful, you can't trust that these trees will just sit around to be chopped down without putting up a fight!

Controls

  • WASD Movement
  • SPACE to chop
  • ESC to return to the Main Menu

Created in 3 days for BenBonk's Game Jam
